original_definition: 'short-term services' means services offered by the transmission system operator with a duration of less than one year;
generated_definition: 'short-term services' means offer tonetwork users both long and short-term services.

Article\u00a02: ‘short-term services’ means services offered by the transmission system operator with a duration of less than one year;
‘short-term services’ means services offered by thetransmission system operator with a duration of less than one year;
Article\u00a014: offer tonetwork users both long andshort-term services.
offer to network users both long and short-term services.
Article\u00a015: offer to storage facility users both long and short-term services; and
Article\u00a032: 3.Transmissionsystem operators shall publish daily updates of availability ofshort-term services(day-ahead and week-ahead) based, inter alia, onnominations, prevailing contractual commitments and regular long-term forecasts of available capacities on an annual basis for up to ten years for all relevant points.

3.   Transmission system operators shall publish daily updates of availability of short-term services (day-ahead and week-ahead) based, inter alia, on nominations, prevailing contractual commitments and regular long-term forecasts of available capacities on an annual basis for up to ten years for all relevant points.
